FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/qa_run.sh
DIR_STATE:["scripts/_canonicalize_lib.py", "scripts/_outputs_qa_utils.py", "scripts/artifact_discoverability_fix.py", "scripts/artifact_expectations.json", "scripts/canonicalize_outputs.py", "scripts/container_health_smoketest.py", "scripts/create_case_study_rubric.py", "scripts/cycle_tracker.py", "scripts/env_dump.py", "scripts/exec_utils.py", "scripts/execution_smoketest.py", "scripts/execution_smoketest.sh", "scripts/failure_signatures.py", "scripts/generate_artifact_index.py", "scripts/link_check.py", "scripts/linkcheck_runner.py", "scripts/minimal_failing_case.py", "scripts/project_tracker.py", "scripts/qa_artifacts.py", "scripts/qa_run.py", "scripts/qa_run.sh", "scripts/qa_run_canonicalization.sh", "scripts/qa_smoke_test.py", "scripts/run_init_outputs_and_capture.py", "scripts/run_outputs_qa.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.sh", "scripts/run_scaffold.py", "scripts/run_scaffold.sh", "scripts/run_validation_harness.sh", "scripts/smoke_test.py", "scripts/update_project_tracker.py", "scripts/update_tracker.py", "scripts/validate_case_studies_schema.py", "scripts/validate_intake.py", "scripts/validate_linkcheck_report.py", "scripts/validate_outputs.py", "scripts/validate_pilot_case_study.py", "scripts/validate_rights_and_licensing.py", "scripts/validate_scaffold.py", "scripts/verifier_benchmark.py", "scripts/write_log_bundle.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a robust bash wrapper that delegates to the standardized Python QA runner (python -m qa.run) with full argument pass-through and proper exit codes.
